cd "${TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY:=$TM_DIRECTORY}";
"${TM_RUBY:=ruby}" <<'EOF' output = `CocoaDialog inputbox --title Input --informative-text 'Record Message' --button1 Record --button2 'Abort'` output = output.split("\n")
# check the button pressed, exit if it wasn't Record if(output[0] !~ /^1$/) exit end
output = `darcs record -a -m '#{output[1].strip.gsub(/(')/, '\\\\1')}'`
puts(output)
